alert.note: Alert for Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 21 at 2:44PM PDT until March 24 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, except 4 to 10 inches below 2000 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Coast Range of Northwest Oregon and Central Coast Range of Western Oregon. In Washington, Willapa Hills. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow, sleet, or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
